    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    Facet PersonProductRef_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:PersonProductRef_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<PersonProductRef xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" xmlns:prod-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/v4" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3">
    <prod-0400:JourneyQueryProduct departureDateTime="09:45:00-06:00">
        <prod-0400:ArrivalPointDetail closingTime="06:00:00Z" code="Example String Value" curbSideBaggageCheckInd="true" kioskInd="true" openingTime="14:15:00+06:00"/>
        <prod-0400:DeparturePointDetail closingTime="14:15:00+06:00" code="Example String Value" curbSideBaggageCheckInd="true" kioskInd="true" openingTime="09:45:00-06:00"/>
        <prod-0400:TransportNumber carrier="Example String Value" operatingCarrier="Example String Value">Example String Value</prod-0400:TransportNumber>
    </prod-0400:JourneyQueryProduct>
    <ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier objID="person_1">
        <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
        <ota2-0400:OtherID organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</ota2-0400:OtherID>
        <ota2-0400:PersonRef>person_1</ota2-0400:PersonRef>
    </ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier>
</PersonProductRef>

      Example JSON

      {
  "PersonProductRef" : {
    "JourneyQueryProduct" : {
      "departureDateTime" : "09:45:00-06:00",
      "ArrivalPoint" : {
        "@type" : "ArrivalPointDetail",
        "code" : "Example String Value",
        "openingTime" : "14:15:00+06:00",
        "closingTime" : "06:00:00Z",
        "kioskInd" : true,
        "curbSideBaggageCheckInd" : true
      },
      "DeparturePoint" : {
        "@type" : "DeparturePointDetail",
        "code" : "Example String Value",
        "openingTime" : "09:45:00-06:00",
        "closingTime" : "14:15:00+06:00",
        "kioskInd" : true,
        "curbSideBaggageCheckInd" : true
      },
      "TransportNumber" : {
        "value" : "Example String Value",
        "carrier" : "Example String Value",
        "operatingCarrier" : "Example String Value"
      }
    },
    "PersonIdentifier" : {
      "objID" : "person_1",
      "Identifier" : {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "organization" : "Acme"
      },
      "OtherID" : [ {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "organization" : "Acme"
      } ],
      "PersonRef" : "person_1"
    }
  }
}
